com.ai

Class NanoLexer<T extends java.lang.Enum<T> & HasPattern>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ai.NanoLexer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of signal token.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    LexicalAnalyzer<T>

    public class NanoLexer<T extends java.lang.Enum<T> & HasPattern>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LexicalAnalyzer<T>
    Concrete implementation of a LexicalAnalyzer. Used as a filter of a given file, returning one NanoTokens at a time, in order read from file.

    Turns an input file into a CharSequence _csf by means of CharSeqFile adapter class.

    Converts into a big Pattern object _superPattern and uses nextTok() to return individual tokens one by one

    Author:
    Martin Tice

        public Token<T> nextTok()
                                                       throws ParseException
        Heart of NanoLexer. Factory Method that returns an object of type Token that represents the next token of file. This is used to return the next token in a given input.
